properties.displayName: Time Travel Debugging Utility Usage - Image
properties.query:
DeviceImageLoadEvents
| where FolderPath endswith "\\ttdrecord.dll" or FolderPath endswith "\\ttdwriter.dll" or FolderPath endswith "\\ttdloader.dll"

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects usage of Time Travel Debugging Utility. Adversaries can execute malicious processes and dump processes, such as lsass.exe, via tttracer.exe.
